metadata.title: Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer
metadata.creator: Handy (Jam) Organization
metadata.description: "AN ANIMATED CARTOON FOR CHILDREN, TELLING THE STORY OF RUDOLPH, A SMALL REINDEER, WHOSE NOSE IS SO RED & SHINY THAT SANTA CLAUS SELECTS HIM TO BE HIS HEAD REINDEER."
metadata.credits: Song-Words and Music by Johnny Marks. Choral Arrangement by Harry R. Wilson. Theme: George Kleinsinger. Narration: Paul Wing. Original Story: Robert L. May. Screen Adaptation: Joseph Stultz.Musical Direction: Samuel Benavie. Musical Arrangements: James Higgins. Scenics: Shane Miller. Animation: Fletcher Smith, William Sturm, Robinson McKee, Howard Kakudo. Photography: Chas. Schettler. Directed by Max Fleischer.
